website_summaries.verdict: A bright diving light that is designed to be used with an action camera such as a GoPro.
pros: This diving light is waterproof up to 45 m and features a normal setting, a power-saving setting, and a flash setting
In the normal setting, which is the brightest, the battery will last approximately 90 min
If needed, this light can be used out of the water as well
cons: Some of the units have a curious condition of turning on even when the power switch has not been touched

customer_reviews.title: Not rated for 45 meters
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this purchase. I bought this light to take scuba diving with me in Thailand. On our first dive the max depth was 35 meters and it turned off within the first 10 minutes. I looked inside once back on the boat and the battery compartment was soaked. I tried drying it out and everything I could to make it work. I was not successful. We are traveling for a few months so I was not able to return it and was forced to throw it in the trash. Very upset, not only for the waste of money but to add trash to the environment because of false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Ratcliff

customer_reviews.title: Faulty power switch
customer_reviews.text: POOR Quality right out of the box. During un-boxing the light turned itself on while still wrapped in the plastic bag it came in. I had not even figured out where the on off switch even was yet. While I was checking it out it came back on all by itself again in my hands. That was the last straw for me. It's now in a box with the return shipping label attached going back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dodge Fan

customer_reviews.title: Way Beyond Expectations
customer_reviews.text: The light is a perfect companion for my ActiveOn CX camera. It stacks perfectly with standard action camera fittings. I'm amzed by the quality of the device with watertight housing, internal battery and a red charge light that goes out on full charge. It is solid and well put together. If I had gone to a dive shop for a similar light, I would have expected to pay over 100.00. You won't be disappointed in this little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Worshipguitar

customer_reviews.title: Tested to 85m/265ft - unbreakable?
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible lights. I've been using them to illuminate video of mussels on the floors of the Finger Lakes in New York, down to 265ft. Never had a problem with leakage. They are very bright, easy to mount on our equipment, and I've been using them for two years without a hitch. In fact, I'm writing this review because today I bought a fifth to add to my others, and I can't believe the negative reviews. The batteries on the cameras (generic 4K action cams) die well before the lights do. I unreservedly recommend these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. L. MCCAFFREY

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for snorkeling on AKASO EK7000 Pro 4K Action Camera
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a snorkeling-compatible light to use with my AKASO EK7000 Pro 4K Action Camera. The light has all the right interfaces to attach to the camera and a Go-Pro compatible floating handle. Worked great..easy to charge with built-in micro-USB charger, lasts well, didn't leak, good price. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: R. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Woah
customer_reviews.text: “Do not look directly into light” as I bumped the very sensative power button taking it out of the box and it blinded me for a second. This little light packs a punch and is super amazing quality!! And it’s waterproof! It fits my gopro hero perfectly and adds to my film set up even without my GoPro. I strongly suggest having this in your collection especially for night filming/underwater. Or honestly this is great for when power goes out too
customer_reviews.author: CelesteTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good light for underwater, not for dry filming.
customer_reviews.text: This light is bright enough for moderate use. It does not cast en even light at close ranges. It is not bright enough to illuminate things evenly at long distances. But underwater it works well, good water proofing and light is dispersed more evenly in the water. When shooting on land, it is just ok. But for the money it is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: A. Junco

customer_reviews.title: GoPro compatible
customer_reviews.text: I love the GoPro mount on top. This thing is really easy to attach to dive gear and include a camera on top. I haven't taken it on any dives but I've put this thing in a bowl of water and left it on for a while with no issues. The way it clamps closed makes me think that I will have no issues with water leaking in at normal dive depths for me. It includes a charging cable and it is very easy to charge the light after use. Also included is a unique little plastic wrench to tighten the bolt and make sure that the included mount is nice and snug.
customer_reviews.author: SHEFF

customer_reviews.title: Bright & super light!
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck! This thing is bright and light in weight. It is just enough light to not have a washed out look at night on close-ups. For real underwater shooting in dark waters, I suggest 2 of these will take care of most filming, even in most demanding light situations.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars since they don’t include a diffuser. A diffuser is important when daylight shooting to avoid wash out. Two light setting are good a bright and light is not beam focused and that helps avoiding wash out.
customer_reviews.author: BDK

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP!
customer_reviews.text: The light turns on your itself, without pressing the button. Defective. I would have returned it but I threw away the box already.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money if you are unable to charge it
customer_reviews.text: I had it for one day .the charging port broke rendering the light useless.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Lights are brighter than I expected and a perfect accessory for my GoPro set up
customer_reviews.text: Lights are brighter than I expected and a perfect accessory for my GoPro set up. I purchased this to place on top of my hand grip and below my camera. I used it outside in the dark at night and it was a perfect light for close ups. The charge lasts a long time. I was in the press that it holds a long charge. I am looking forward to using this light on upcoming trips.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppy Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike,all good,it works well,very bright for maybe an hour straight which is really good,and it's my second one. I use strictly with my GoPro's.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cronin

customer_reviews.title: If using out of water, Great light.
customer_reviews.text: We are on our honeymoon and the light made it exactly 1 trip into the water snorkeling before it died. When I say it died, I mean it short circuited, turned itself on and stayed on until you removed the battery which was covered in some kind of ooze. Its definitely bright but don't take it in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Roche

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: Use this guy on my PADI certification for my last training dive and it was great. I like that you can mount the camera on the top of the light and the fact that my old GoPro batteries are getting some use!
customer_reviews.author: carl TALAUE

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Had no problem diving over 60 ft with the light. Did seem to be dinner ik n second dive without recharge, so I'll look into a second battery. No leaks and helped brighten my video.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco

customer_reviews.title: Only used it a few times and the hinge broke
customer_reviews.text: I only used the light a few times and plastic piece that holds the hinge broke off (see picture). I tried to contact the company via email to exercise the two year warranty and have not heard back. I would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: DLR DSLR

customer_reviews.title: Light switch fails after a couple uses
customer_reviews.text: A great light until you open it up for charging. After a couple uses the light stays on and the only way to turn it off is to pull the battery out, rendering the device impractical in the field (as the light will stay on until it dies regardless of button presses). I did not receive help on finding an answer, I've bought three of these and it happens each time. Otherwise a good light.
customer_reviews.author: Conor MacDonnell

customer_reviews.title: good light
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bright dive light. I beach dove a small island just off koh lipe in thailand with no problems. Lasted the 1 hour of the dive to get me around the island once, and then back to the main island.
customer_reviews.author: k m

customer_reviews.title: Nice for GoPros
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to film some up close shots in the dark. This light is perfect. I have it mounted under my GoPro Hero 5 which is attached to a head mount. Working out great!!
customer_reviews.author: Trusty

customer_reviews.title: Seems bright, wasnt able to see a big difference underwater with or without it
customer_reviews.text: I didnt see much of a difference on the go pro with or without this light underwater. Overall, the light seems like its pretty awesome. Nice and bright, works well, i just didnt see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: BJL99

customer_reviews.title: Great scuba light for camera.
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a shallow dive trip. I took it to 55 feet and worked flawlessly. I will say the hardware started rusting on the 1st dive. But the light is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: JOSH MCURY

customer_reviews.title: Suptig Diving Light
customer_reviews.text: Love how bright the light is in and out of water
customer_reviews.author: Jasper Moody

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have some older GoPro cameras and low light filming is not great. This light changed that. Bright, sturdy and works perfect underwater or in wet conditions. I would suggest it.
customer_reviews.author: Mobile Bike Pro

customer_reviews.title: Performed as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t dive with it, however it did great in shallow water. Made sure that all the seals are clean, as you would with a go pro anyway and used a little bit of silicone on the seals. No leaks and it was very bright!
customer_reviews.author: Demo_Homer

customer_reviews.title: The light is very bright, but....
customer_reviews.text: The light is very bright. It would be a 5 Star review but the unit seems to turn on and off by itself periodically. Maybe the one I received was faulty.
customer_reviews.author: John T. De Rose

customer_reviews.title: Super good- durable- water resistant - and great flash!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product as good as my previously owned original (costs 3x this one!). Thanks for the reliable service of delivery and communication! Thanks for this product i am using my go pro for multi purpose! Photos with the 'flash'now look so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This awesome. We got some great underwater shots with our ...
customer_reviews.text: This awesome.We got some great underwater shots with our Gopro and this.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: but I am sure it will work perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bright, light weight and seems durable. Fits right with my GoPro. Have yet to use it on a dive, but I am sure it will work perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jonah P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice n bright
customer_reviews.text: Nice n bright above water. I could not test it underwater due to the housing for my GoPro
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: Very good item. Very bright
customer_reviews.text: Very very very bright. I use it as a flashlight a lot.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Really bright and great light
customer_reviews.text: Far brighter than I expected I even skied at night with it. Its battery well outlasted the go pro's
customer_reviews.author: Chris Buhlmann

customer_reviews.title: Omg buy this
customer_reviews.text: I scuba dive and this is awesome underwater one of the Best Buy’s I have ever made
customer_reviews.author: Amy J. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Go pro dive light
customer_reviews.text: Ok product but not bright enough to make good quality videos. Dove with it at night not very bright also
customer_reviews.author: Brendon Fahl Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Solid light so far
customer_reviews.text: Very bright light. 2 level brightness + flash mode is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Redlich

customer_reviews.title: This is one powerful little light !
customer_reviews.text: This is one powerful little light ! It mounts perfectly on my SJCAM SJ7 Camera
customer_reviews.author: Raezer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Throws out a lot of light especially for the closer shots
customer_reviews.author: Terry Dartnall

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this if you’re planning to dive with ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this if you’re planning to dive with it! I went 40 feet max and it flooded.
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Rinn

customer_reviews.title: Missing battery
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with battery. Kinda defeats the purpose of it being mobile. Nothing in description shows “battery not included”
customer_reviews.author: Zach Schmittling

customer_reviews.title: Great light option for shallow diving and very cost effective
customer_reviews.text: Great light option for shallow diving and very cost effective. It could be brighter ​but for the price point a great product. I dove from 30' - 130' and have not had any issues with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer B. Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Great productGreat product
customer_reviews.text: Great light reaches 30 to 40 feet i use it for skiing I could not see anyone using it for actual diving
customer_reviews.author: Nicole E. Wortis

customer_reviews.title: It was broken
customer_reviews.text: It's work and it's okay but the charger port is broken and I cannot charge it anymore and I bought it like that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright light
customer_reviews.text: Really like product fits nicely on my go pro hero 5 , really bright light havent used it under water yet.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: but a good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not ridiculously bright when you get deeper underwater, but a good buy for the price. Had no problems going down to 30 feet
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Great but handling could have been better.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but the box was already torn open on both ends when I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very. Right!
customer_reviews.text: Light is very bright! Can’t wait to try it on our next dive trip!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of Money. started flickering and wouldn't shut off. When I got out of the water and opened it up the battery compartment was flooded and the battery was corroded.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Stokowski

customer_reviews.title: Tough little thing and definitely packs a punch for its size
customer_reviews.text: Took this thing free diving to devil's den about 50' deep works Gray water tight and battery lasts a long time pretty bright for the size and price definitely recommend. Go pro mount is really convenient you can stack it with other accessories too
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: Suptig Diving Light High Power Dimmable Waterproof LED Video Light Fill Night Light Diving Underwater Light Waterproof 147ft(45m) for Gopro Hero 6/5/5S/4/4S/3+/2/SJCAM SJ4000/SJ5000/YI Action
feature_bullets: GREAT DIVING LIGHTS Take amazing POV underwater vids with this Suptig light for Gopro underwater light.Whether it is snorkel, scuba or dive, the Suptig diving lights for Gopro Hero 8/ Hero 7/ Hero 6/ Hero 5/ Hero 4/ Hero 3+/ Hero session/Hero+/fusion will be great accessories for all those activities. Each Suptig light has a 147ft (45M) waterproof test from the Suptig factory

WIDE-ANGLE 300Lumen Max. (5500K-6000K) by 3 LEDs.This is THE underwater light to buy if you're looking for aunderwater light that doesn't get tangled, is easy for different surroundings use, and is super lightweight. You just need to buy a suptig cold shoe mount adapter to mount it on the hot shoe seat of the SLR camera (Sales link: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07CB68ZWF )
THREE MODES OF LIGHT: Normal(HI) Power saving(LOW),Flash(SOS). Size: 2.95 in(L) x 1.65 in(W) x 2.75 in(H)
RECHARGEABLE BATTERY: 1050mAh. Running time: High light (1.5 hours); Low light (4 hours); SOS (6 hours). The battery can be removed for replacement(Compatible with Gopro hero 3/3 + batteries)

GREAT EXPERIENCE, and a GREAT PRODUCT Loving this underwater light, Regardless of night use, or underwater use is very appropriate. For GoPro Hero6/5 4Session/4/ 3+/ 3 and XiaoYi SJCAM. All of LED waterproof light are backed by 24-Month Warranty and 30 Days Money Back Guarantee
